alert.note: Alert for Parke; Vermillion (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 03 at 10:54PM EST until March 12 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of central Indiana and west central Indiana, including the following counties, in central Indiana, Boone and Hendricks. In west central Indiana, Fountain, Montgomery, Parke, Putnam and Vermillion. * WHEN...Until 700 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1054 PM EST, Flooding is already occurring in the warned area. Between 1.5 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Indianapolis, Crawfordsville, Plainfield, Brownsburg, Lebanon, Zionsville, Greencastle, Mooresville, Danville, Clinton, Covington, Rockville, Veedersburg, Newport, Avon, Attica, Pittsboro, Whitestown, Cloverdale and Thorntown. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
